marytts.features
Class MaryGenericFeatureProcessors.UnitLogF0

java.lang.Object
  marytts.features.MaryGenericFeatureProcessors.UnitLogF0
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
MaryGenericFeatureProcessors.UnitLogF0Delta
Enclosing class:
MaryGenericFeatureProcessors
public static class MaryGenericFeatureProcessors.UnitLogF0
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContinuousFeatureProcessor

Calculates the log of the fundamental frequency in the middle of a unit segment. This processor should be used by target items only -- for unit features during voice building, the actual measured values should be used.

protected float process(Target target,
                        boolean delta)
Compute log f0 and log f0 delta for the given target.

Parameters:
target -
